mapper.insert: INSERT INTO system_device (id, name, product_id, device_key, device_secret, gateway_id, station_id, status, dynamic_attributes, create_time, deleted) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{productId}, #{deviceKey}, #{deviceSecret}, #{gatewayId}, #{stationId}, #{status}, #{dynamicAttributes}, #{createTime}, #{deleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE system_device SET name = #{name}, gateway_id = #{gatewayId}, station_id = #{stationId}, status = #{status}, dynamic_attributes = #{dynamicAttributes}, deleted = #{deleted}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, product_id, device_key, device_secret, gateway_id, station_id, status, last_heartbeat_time, dynamic_attributes, create_time, deleted FROM system_device WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, name, product_id, device_key, device_secret, gateway_id, station_id, status, last_heartbeat_time, dynamic_attributes, create_time, deleted FROM system_device WHERE device_key = #{deviceKey}
SELECT id, name, product_id, device_key, device_secret, gateway_id, station_id, status, last_heartbeat_time, dynamic_attributes, create_time, deleted FROM system_device WHERE deleted = 0

SELECT id, name, product_id, device_key, device_secret, gateway_id, station_id, status, last_heartbeat_time, dynamic_attributes, create_time, deleted FROM system_device WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND deleted = 0

SELECT id, name, product_id, device_key, device_secret, gateway_id, station_id, status, last_heartbeat_time, dynamic_attributes, create_time, deleted FROM system_device WHERE gateway_id = #{gatewayId} AND deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM system_device WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND deleted = 0
